page.title: 16Jenny's Day (aged 9)
page.content: It is Saturday June 15th 1985. No school today which is sad, because I like school. Nevermind, Uncle Bob is up from London for the weekend and we always have fun with him. I get up at 7, Corn Flakes for breakfast, wash, brush teeth and get ready to meet the coach. There are hugs and kisses for me and my two sisters. Mum and Dad have prepared a nice meal for him and he brought some wine. That is the bit I like best. What a lovely day we had. My Uncle Bob is so funny and we had a laugh when he fell asleep in the arm chair and his glasses twisted around his nose. He looked like Eric Morecambe. Jill my sister laughed so much that he woke up and chased us around the room. After tea it was time for bed. We were told off for talking and giggling.
